This issue will be updated to reflect the current state of [BIP352](https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/1458) integration. PRs ready for review: * https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/1458 * https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28122 Testing: * For a wallet with send and receive support, compile https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28453 * Post your signet / testnet silent payment address in the comments! Overall plan: * Send and receive support in the Bitcoin Core wallet: - [x] Code cleanup / refactor: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28244 - [x] Dependency: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28246 - [ ] Base protocol: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28122 - [ ] Sending (depends on 28122): https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28201 - [ ] Receiving (depends on 28122, 28201): https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28453 - [ ] Send and receive functional tests (depends on 28453) (not started) * Light client support: - [ ] Index for silent payment tweaks (depends on 28122): https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28241 - [ ] New BIP157 filter type for tweak data (not started) - [ ] Serve new filter type (not started) * Long-term - [ ] Move base protocol to `libsecp` as a module (not started) - [ ] Refactor Core to use silent payments `libsecp` module directly (not started)
